#Comment should be ignored
dataset= file1_1.fits file1_2.fits 0.0014 0.003 beam1.fits beam5.fits
dataset= file2.fits file4.fits 0.002 0.04  beam3.fits funny_beam.fits 1.1
bin_data= 300
mean_sub= true

 #Inline comment
